body.name: Linksys Atlas WiFi 6 Router Home WiFi Mesh System, Dual-Band, 2,000 Sq. ft Coverage, 25+ Devices, Speeds up to (AX3000) 3.0Gbps - MX2000 1-Pack
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF WIFI 6: Linksys Atlas 6 mesh wifi router delivers lightning-fast gigabit WiFi speeds to your entire home for uninterrupted connectivity for incredible performance

POWERFUL MESH WIFI 6 COVERAGE: Supporting 25+ devices & up to 2,000 sq ft these mesh wireless routers provide up to 4x more WiFi capacity. An advanced Qualcomm chipset delivers an excellent mesh WiFi 6 experience for stable streaming and wire-like low latency making the Atlas 6 an excellent gaming router

EASY SETUP & CONTROL: Wireless routers set up in minutes with the free Linksys App, allowing seamless management of your WiFi mesh network system. You can view or prioritize which connected devices are using the most WiFi from anywhere.
SECURITY OUT OF THE BOX: With automatic firmware updates, parental controls, and separate guest networks these WiFi mesh routers allow the entire family to surf safely.

POWERED BY INTELLIGENT MESH TECHNOLOGY: Eliminate dead zones and dynamically maximize speed with Linksys WiFi mesh networks. Expand the range of your WiFi network by adding nodes to keep your connection going strong
body.description: Linksys Atlas 6 mesh WiFi router brings the reliability and speed of WiFi 6, at an incredibly affordable price. This dual-band AX3000 mesh wireless router accesses 160 MHz channels for more powerful and stable connections, supporting speeds up to 3.0 Gbps. Linksys’s Intelligent Mesh Technology means this WiFi 6 router can grow with you, simply add more routers to expand coverage for stronger connections to more devices. Covering up to 2,000 sq ft, and supporting 25+ devices, your entire family can stream, game, and video chat without interruption all from the same WiFi mesh network.The Linksys Atlas 6 mesh WiFi system can blanket your entire home from the garage to the backyard guest house without needing a WiFi extender or WiFi booster. An advanced Qualcomm chipset brings industry-leading technology, transforming home and business WiFi with wire-like stability, and up to 4x more capacit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Router that works and looks good!
reviews.reviewText: Well priced, actually functions as meant to, easy set up, clean lines and nice looking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy application setup.
reviews.reviewText: Nice clean look and great WiFI coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know a lot about technology and I was able to set it up on my own following the straight forward instructions. I haven’t had any problems. The guy I spoke to from Apple said this is the one he personally recommends (not as a representative of Apple).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Router is easy to set up but tends to drop connection from time to time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost plug n play!
reviews.reviewText: After messing around with other well known brands and having to call in for help with ISP simply to hook up the device, I decided on the Linksys based on it's reviews of ease of hook up. I have used Linksys many years ago when things were more primitive and always had good luck with the brand. We hooked this unit up, followed the instructions and boom, it was functioning. If you are able to read and follow instructions, the set up will be easy like it was for us. Happy with the unit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and works
reviews.reviewText: Added to sonic 1G fiber, 500+ mbps up&down on wifi6 laptop, 350 up&down on wifi5. Full 1G speed when wired. Easy set up, can broadcast 2 networks (home & guest) at full speed. I did not set up as a mesh cuz my apt is small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Arrived very quickly. The exact item I needed for alarm and home network connections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Awesome So Far!
reviews.reviewText: Setup was quicker ever. glad to see how far the process has come along
